<template>
  <transition-group :name="name">
    <slot/>
  </transition-group>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'CssGroup',
  props: ['name']
}
</script>

// WEBPACK FOOTER // // Notifications.vue?01c36b63

<template>
  <transition-group
    :css="false"
    @enter="enter"
    @leave="leave"
    @after-leave="afterLeave"
  >
    <slot/>
  </transition-group>
</template>
<script>
  export default {
    name: 'VelocityGroup',
    methods: {
      enter (el, complete) {
        this.$emit('enter', { el, complete })
      },
      leave (el, complete) {
        this.$emit('leave', { el, complete })
      },
      afterLeave () {
        this.$emit('afterLeave')
      }
    }
  }
</script>
